summary: Multi-Admin System feature testing completed successfully. All features working as expected: Super Admin can see Change Password and Create Admin buttons, regular users and non-super admins cannot see these buttons. Backend endpoints for change-password and create-admin work correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: Super Admin login returns is_super_admin: true
Backend: /api/admin/create-admin endpoint works for super admin
Backend: New admin created is NOT super admin (is_super_admin: false)
Backend: Non-super admin cannot create admins (returns 403)
Frontend: Change Password button visible in sidebar for Super Admin
Frontend: Change Password modal has all required fields (current, new, confirm)
Frontend: Create Admin button visible in Users tab for Super Admin
Frontend: Create Admin modal has all required fields (name, email, password)
Frontend: Note about non-super admin privileges is visible in Create Admin modal
Frontend: Change Password button NOT visible for regular user
Frontend: Create Admin button NOT visible for regular user
Frontend: Change Password button NOT visible for non-super admin
Frontend: Create Admin button NOT visible for non-super admin
seed_data_creation: Created and deleted test admin (testadmin@american.club) during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Multi-Admin System feature is fully implemented and working. Super Admin (admin@american.club) has is_super_admin: true in database. Change Password button appears in sidebar for super admin only. Create Admin button appears in Users tab for super admin only. New admins created via Create Admin are NOT super admins.

mocked_apis.SignalWire voice API: Account suspended - calls use simulation mode
mocked_apis.Infobip calls API: Configuration blocked - calls use simulation mode

screenshots: .screenshots/02_admin_dashboard.png - Admin dashboard with Change Password button visible
.screenshots/03_users_tab.png - Users tab with Create Admin button visible
.screenshots/04_change_password_modal.png - Change Password modal with all fields
.screenshots/06_create_admin_modal.png - Create Admin modal with all fields and note
.screenshots/09_non_super_admin_users_tab.png - Non-super admin Users tab (no Create Admin)
